Poverty Data Explorer of World Bank data: Share of population living in extreme poverty: 2011 vs. 2017 PPPs
column6: Show data from both income and expenditure surveys
column9: Extreme poverty is defined as living below the International Poverty Line, which is $1.90 per day in 2011 PPPs and $2.15 per day in 2017 PPPs. This data is adjusted for inflation and for differences in the cost of living between countries.
